* The Lord Of The Rings.description: Sauron can spend a single point of Will each turn without reducing his own store.

Ancient Enemies.description: This model re-rolls 1s To Wound when fighting in combat against models with the keywords listed in the brackets in its profile.

Ancient Evil.description: Enemy models within 18" of this model suffer a -1 penalty to its Courage Value (does not stack with other negative Courage Value penalty effects).

Backstabbers.description: This model receives +1 to their To Wound rolls when making strikes against Trapped models (this bonus stacks with other similar effects).

Bane Of Kings.description: This model must re-roll all failed To Wound rolls when making strikes in combat.

Venom.description: This model must re-roll all failed To Wound rolls when making strikes in combat.

Bane.description: Bane Weapons cause 1D3 Wounds per successful strike in combat against models with the keywords listed in the brackets in its profile.

Blades Of The Dead.description: This model uses the enemies Courage Value instead of Defence Value on the Wound Chart. This model cannot use Special Strikes.

Blood And Glory.description: This model recovers one used Might Point (if possible) when they kill an enemy Hero in combat.

Bodyguard.description:
All Warrior and Hero models from the same army list with this special rule will automatically Bodyguard the Hero from the same army list with the highest Heroic Tier. If there is more than one Hero with the highest Heroic Tier, the controlling player may choose. As long as the bodyguarded model is alive on the battlefield, this model passes all Courage tests.
Models that are part of an allied contingent must select a model from their own army list.

Burly.description: This model does not suffer a -1 penalty to their duel roll when fighting with a Two-Handed Weapon. Additionally, they may move their full Move Value when carrying Heavy Objects.

Cave Dweller.description: This model adds +1 to all, Jump, Leap and Climb tests. This model also suffers no penalties for fighting in the dark.

Expert Rider.description: Whilst this model is mounted it may re-roll the dice when making Jump, Swim and Thrown Rider tests. If this model is carrying a Shield and Bow they will still receive the +1 to Defence from the Shield, if they dismount they lose this bonus. Additionally, this model can pick up Light Objects without having to dismount.

Expert Shot.description: This model may shoot twice during the Shoot Phase, the model may shoot the same target twice or two different targets.

Fearless.description: This model passes courage tests automatically.

Fell Sight.description: This model does not need Line Of Sight to Charge other models. Additionally, this model can target models with the Stalk Unseen Special Rule without penalty.

Fleetfoot.description: A model that has both this and the Woodland Creature Special Rule will also apply the Woodland creature Special Rule to its Mount.

Fly.description: This model may move up to 12", but may not end its move on uneven terrain that its base can't sit on safely. This model may fly over enemy model control zones without penalty or the need to Charge as long as the move ends outside of the Control Zones. The model may use its Movement Value as noted on its profile when moving instead of 12" but gains no bonuses when doing so. However, the model is able to enter terrain they would otherwise Fly over. When entering terrain and obstacles in this way, the model must leave fully before being able to Fly again. Models with the Fly Special Rule that are on top of terrain, also have a 1" control zone directly below them, the Flying model can both Charge enemies and be Charged by enemies in this way.

Harbinger Of Evil.description: An enemy model within 12 inches of this model suffers a -1 penalty to its Courage. Note: This is not cumulative with other similar penalties such as those provided by Goblin Drums, the Ancient Evil special rule, and so on.

Resistant To Magic.description: If this model is targeted by a Magical Power, it may use an additional 'free' dice when it makes a Resist test, even if it has no Will remaining or decides not to use any Will points

Terror.description:
Should a model wish to Charge this model, it must first take a Courage test before it moves. If the test is passed, the model may Charge as normal. If the test is failed, the model does not Charge and may not move at all this turn.
Sometimes, a model will only cause Terror in certain enemies. In these instances, the creatures that are afflicted are clearly listed, and only those models need to make a Courage test before charging this model. For example, a model with the Terror (Orc) will cause Terror in all Orc models.

Throw Stones (Hobbit).description: If this model does not move at all during the Move phase, then in the Shoot phase it may make a shooting attack with Strength 1 and range 8".

Will Of Evil.description:
This model must give up 1 point of Will at the end of the Fight phase if it has been involved in one or more Fights that turn. Note that if a model is in base contact with an enemy model then it must fight - it cannot choose not to fight! Once the model is reduced to 0 Will points, it is banished and therefore removed as a casualty. If a model with this special rule uses their last Will points to cast a Magical Power with the Instant duration, the effects of the Magical Power will be resolved before the model is removed as a casualty.
Additionally, a Hero wearing The One Ring is not invisible to this model as they are to others. Furthermore, this model does not need to give up a point of Will if they are fighting a model wearing the Ring-not even if other enemy models are included as part of Multiple Combat.

Woodland Creature.description: An Infantry model with this special rule may move through woods and forests that are classified as difficult terrain as if they are open ground. Note that this doesn't mean they can automatically climb terrain in those areas, nor move through tree trunks or jump fallen Obstacles.

Master Of Battle.description: If an enemy Hero model calls a heroic action within 6" this model may call the same heroic action for free. Sometime this ability will be activated on the roll of 1D6 as noted in the model's stat profile.

The Age Of Men Is Over.description: All model within 3" gain the Hatred (Man) Special Rule.

The Time Of The Orc Has Come.description: Once per game, at the start of the Fight Phase, all friendly Mordor models within 12" can re-roll failed To Wound rolls for the rest of the turn when making strikes.

Orcish Brawler.description: If this model is outnumbered in a fight (excluding supporting models), they gain a +1 to Fight and Attack Values.

Hatred.description: A model with this Special Rule adds +1 to their To Wound rolls when fighting against a model with the relevant Keyword as listed on their profile.
